mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(memId, memPw, memName, memBirth, memEmail, memPhone, memZipCode, memAddr1, memAddr2) VALUES (#{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memName}, #{memBirth}, #{memEmail}, #{memPhone}, #{memZipCode}, #{memAddr1}, #{memAddr2})
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where memId = #{memId}
select memId from user where memId = #{memId} and memPw = #{memPw}
select memId, memName, memStat from user where memId = #{memId} and memPw = #{memPw}
select memId, memName from user where memName = #{memName} and memEmail = #{memEmail}
select memId, memEmail from user where memId = #{memId}
mapper.update: update user set memStat='yes', memPw = #{memPw} where memId = #{memId}
